ingredients.ingredient: 1 (12 ounce) container fully cooked luncheon meat (e.g. Spam)

cookingTips: Slice Spam into thin pieces for even cooking
Whisk eggs and milk together until well combined before dipping bread
Cook French toast over medium heat to ensure the egg custard cooks through
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This is a hearty comfort food combination. How will you cook the Spam for best texture?
